CHAT.comment: MOT and Chi are compatible with each other and play well together. EXP remains in the background. Although most of the activity is spent building structures and stacking objects , MOT does call Chi's attention to the fact that the nickel won't stick to the magnet and to objects that repel each other. Mot directs most of the conversation by continually asking Chi questions. Video does not start until later; transcription until then is solely from audio

u.a: talks about setting up magnets .
whispers
video starts here
MOT and Chi sit on the floor , next to each other; the objects are spread out in front of Chi
touches nickel to the black base and slides it around
picks the lego pieces up and then puts them back on the floor
a cat walks in front of the camera
MOT and Chi play separately; Mot is picking up objects with the yellow wand , and Chi is stacking objects on the black base
Chi

g.ga: orange ball stuck to yellow wand

u.a: the tower of silver men which Chi is building starts to lean over; Chi catches it before it falls and then removes the top silver man so that the tower will stand
points to the tower of silver men
the tower of silver men falls
MOT and Chi work together arranging objects on the black base; the purple star is on the base along with two silver sticks which are standing up
places a silver man on top of a silver stick
the silver stick , upon which Chi was placing the silver man , fell
Mot places a paper clip on top of a silver stick
the paper clip did not remain on the top of the silver stick; it slid down the stick
places another paper clip on top of the second silver stick; the paper clip stays on top of the stick

g.ga: paper clip staying on top of the silver stick
paper clip which slid down the silver stick

u.a: Chi tries to remove a silver piece from the black base; in doing so , Chi moves the base away from Mot who was trying to put the orange man on the silver sticks
places each of the orange man's hands on the top of a silver stick
the orange man fell
picks up the orange man and takes the two silver sticks off the black base
whispered

g.ga: orange man hanging from the two sticks

u.a: removes objects from the black base
whispered

g.ga: hang the orange man from the two silver sticks and then stand the sticks on the black base

u.a: MOT puts the orange man and silver sticks onto the black base and then picks them back up
places the flat silver circle on the black base

g.ga: standing the orange man on the silver sticks

u.a: whispered
puts the turtle underneath the orange man so that the orange man can stand on the turtle
lies a silver man across the top of the two silver sticks in an attempt to keep the two sticks standing
the orange man and a silver stick falls

g.ga: putting silver man across the top of two silver sticks

u.a: touches the square checker-board magnet to the black base; the square magnet doesn't stick
stands a silver man on the black base in front of a silver stick and tries placing the orange man on top of the silver man
the orange man fell off the silver man

g.ga: second silver stick or orange man
black base or top of the silver man

u.a: lifts the second silver stick from the horizontal position on the black base

g.ga: make orange man stand on silver man

u.a: pulls the silver man off the black base and puts it together with three other silver men
in pulling the silver man off the base , Chi moved the black base and knocked the silver stick , which Mot was trying to set upright , down
MOT is reattempting to hang the orange man from the silver sticks
sing-song voice
places another silver man underneath the orange man to make the orange man's base larger
the orange man falls
places the orange man , who holds onto the two silver sticks , down onto the tops of the silver man , attempting again to get the orange man to stand on its own
MOT continues trying to get the orange man to stand , but the orange man falls
the orange man lies on his back on top of the silver men
places a silver man flat across the tops of the other silver man , making a platform on which the orange man can stand
places the orange man on the silver man platform; the orange man remains standing

g.ga: Chi could make the orange man stand on its own

u.a: Chi
MOT and Chi stack washers and nuts , but this is hard to see in the video because the view of them is blocked by the orange man and silver men apparatus
the orange man falls
the orange man falls off the black base
whispered
points to a washer which is attached to the edge of the flat silver circle on the base and is moving up and down
holds yellow wand over the moving washer; the washer is repelled away from the wand and stops moving
places two washers on the silver circle on the black base; they don't stick to the flat silver circle well

g.ga: next to the edge of the silver circle and base , at a slant

u.a: demonstrates the procedure described three tiers above
MOT wants to put a washer on top of a tower which Chi has constructed by placing a nut on top of a silver stick
places the washer on top of the nut
removes the washer without having ever let go of it
places a paper clip on top of the nut; the tower falls
MOT and Chi start arranging and rearranging objects on the black base; the orange man falls off the silver man platform
the orange man has been placed on the lego pieces as if he's going to sleep
pats orange man on the back
puts the flat triangle and the square checker-board magnet on top of the orange man as if they were blankets
MOT and Chi are building a tower of all the silver pieces
the tower is quite high
Chi was trying to stand the silver stick upright on the top of the tower , but it wouldn't remaing standing; Mot suggests that Chi lay the stick down flat
the tower fell
removes objects from the black base
MOT and Chi collect the washers , and then the nuts; Chi builds a tower starting with the largest pieces , the washers , and then adds the next largest , the nuts , and then the silver men
puts a paper clip on each arm of the top silver man
places the green triangle and the purple star on the black base , around the tower
picks up the red ball , holds it about two inches above the ground , and drops the ball; the ball attaches to the black base and rolls down the side of the base; Chi does this several times
removes a silver stick from the base with effort; some of the silver men fall from the tower as a result
removes the rest of the silver men from the tower
holds the yellow wand next to what remains of the tower; the tower bends over and Mot continues pulling it down with the wand
Chi is removing pieces from the black base
Chi

g.ga: Chi's new arrangement on the base

u.a: Chi has arranged two silver men , standing , with each of the silver sticks across the silver men's shoulders
MOT places a washer on one of the silver sticks
stands a silver man on the two silver sticks
removes some cat fur from the second washer , which Mot places on the other silver stick
removes one of the washers and everything falls down

g.ga: get the guy to stand on the two sticks

u.a: during pause , Chi rebuilds the structure , but he can't get the silver man to stand on the two sticks like he did before
refers to one silver man who stands on the base and holds a silver stick vertically
Chi place a silver stick in the silver man's other hand as well
grabs hold of a silver man

g.ga: make the silver man hold the two silver sticks
silver man holding the two silver sticks

u.a: holds the silver man and the two sticks with two hands and moves the two silver sticks
puts a silver man on top of a silver stick and slides it down , and then removes the silver man
the silver man stands holding the two silver sticks and another silver man stands on top of the silver sticks .
places another silver man on top of the tower; it falls; places another silver man on top of the tower again; it falls , as do the two silver sticks
sets two silver men upright on the black base with a silver stick across their shoulders

g.ga: two silver men Mot is using

u.a: puts another silver stick on top of the one lying on the silver men's shoulders
removes silver stick that Chi put in place
places the second silver stick across the silver men's other shoulders
stands three silver men on top of the silver sticks which lie like parallel bars on two silver men's shoulders
moves the three top silver men slightly
places a washer on a silver man's head; repeats action on a second silver man
places a washer on the third silver man's head; in doing so , he makes another silver man fall
sing song

in trying to fix the silver man-silver stick structure , Chi created a new one: the silver sticks rest on the shoulders of a silver man and on the black base , like a slide , and one silver man remains standing on the two silver sticks
puts a silver man on the shoulders of the silver man that remains standing on the two silver sticks
annoyed
the two men on the silver sticks have just fallen
removes all pieces from the black base
hands Chi the green triangle
puts down the green triangle and picks up a silver man
the purple star , which is on the black base , has fallen several times; Chi has uprighted the star each time it fell
during pause , Chi makes a tower of silver men and silver sticks
Chi placed a silver stick on the top silver man and the silver stick fell off
moves to place a stack of washers on a silver stick but the stick is too wobbly to hold them

g.ga: try to put washers on silver stick

u.a: drops washers , one at a time , onto the silver man tower
grabs a handful of objects from the floor around the black base and puts them on the base
stacks nuts on top of each other; the stack bends over under the weight of the nuts , but doesn't fall; a half- arch of nuts extends from the base and over the base's edge
grabs hold of the yellow wand , which is next to the half-arch , and moves it slightly , knocking the half- arch over .
MOT and Chi remove objects from the black base and the yellow wand
hands the flat silver circle to Chi

g.ga: flat silver circle which was on the black base previously

u.a: tries to stand a washer up on it's side; it won't stay in place
picks up two washers and tries to make them stand
when Chi sets his washers on the edge of the base , they are pulled into the middle of the base
when Mot placed the two washers on the base , they spread away from each other
stacks two nuts on top of the base
MOT and Chi both reach for the yellow wand at the same time; Mot gets the wand and gives it to Chi
picks up the objects with the yellow wand

g.ga: with a sweep of a wand

u.a: stands nuts on their sides around the flat silver circle on the black base .
Chi wants the nut so that he can stack it on two other nuts which are stacked on the black base
MOT could be referring to a nut with two washers attached to it like ears , but this is not visible in the video at this point
takes the nut and stacks it on the other two nuts
rolls a nut which was on the floor towards Chi
places two more nuts on the stack , for a total of five; the top two fall off
the tower is seven nuts high
places a silver man on top of the nut tower
the silver man wouldn't stay steady on the top of the tower
during pause , Chi built a tower of silver men next to the nut tower
adds washers onto the arms of the silver men at the bottom of the silver-man tower
goes to put washers on the arms of the top silver man , but doesn't follow through with the action
video ends
